controllerId.description: Gets or sets the controller ID.

aadAuthority.description: Gets or sets the authority of the SPN with which fabric agent communicates to service.

applicationId.description: Gets or sets the client/application Id of the SPN with which fabric agent communicates to service.

audience.description: Gets or sets the audience of the SPN with which fabric agent communicates to service.

objectId.description: Gets or sets the object Id of the SPN with which fabric agent communicates to service.

tenantId.description: Gets or sets the tenant Id of the SPN with which fabric agent communicates to service.

ManagedServiceIdentity.description: Managed service identity (system assigned and/or user assigned identities)

type.description: Type of managed service identity (where both SystemAssigned and UserAssigned types are allowed).

userAssignedIdentities.description: The set of user assigned identities associated with the resource. The userAssignedIdentities dictionary keys will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}. The dictionary values can be empty objects ({}) in requests.
